ygData.subject: Hmmmm, trouble really brewing?!?!
ygData.msgSnippet: Hiyas! regarding the Chaos war post: Some of these are a possibility, but I highly doubt (for one) that Halas wont be able to be zoned into or out of ?   They
ygData.messageBody:
Hiyas! regarding the Chaos war post:
Some of these are a possibility, but I highly doubt (for one) that Halas
wont be able to be zoned into or out of ? They wouldn't close off that zone
so that No one could start a barbarian while some war is going on(?!?!?).. if
they do thats rediculous! :) But some of the ideas sound kinda nifty.. but
I also doubt that they would trash starting sitties, including Rivervale..
(Yikes would they trash the zone music TOO?!? lol) And cut off teleporting
to Karanas alltogether? Seems Kind of unlikely to me, unless they change
North Karana ring and or spires closer to Surefall, that would be nice!! hehe
(if they leave EK druid ring!!) Oh well, I could be totally proved
wrong!!..but I'm still excited either way!

Have a great day!
~Lori : Ivymayden, Vyxen, X~Melalle
